## Source: ossf-package-analysis (cca8fd5e83789150c59c9dc304bd111e21fa58646d9a03d602b6c5bcdfa39e8b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'my-wallet-backupt-decryption-tool' @ 0.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
